entry.title: ManishTirkey/Todo-Application: A lightweight cross-platform solution for managing application autostart functionality in Electron apps that remains as a top window. Seamlessly enables your application to launch on system startup and stay visible above other windows across Windows, macOS, and Linux.
entry.content: A lightweight cross-platform solution for managing application autostart functionality in Electron apps that remains as a top window. Seamlessly enables your application to launch on system startup and stay visible above other windows across Windows, macOS, and Linux.
